title: GET_TRAIN_TRACK_INDEX
content:
0x9AA339D// GetTrainTrackIndex
int GET_TRAIN_TRACK_INDEX(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: The track index the train is currently on.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_TRACK_INDEX
GetTrainTrackIndex(vehicle)
